episodes.title: John Sweeney on Scientology and Libel
episodes.description:
BBC Panorama Journalist John Sweeney on the urgent need for reform of Britain's libel laws.  Major publishers in the UK turned down John's book 'The Church of Fear: Inside the Weird World of Scientology'. British publisher Transworld has cancelled publication of Pulitzer Prize-winner Lawrence Wright's book 'Going Clear: Scientology, Hollywood and the Prison of Belief', following legal advice.  

In the video, John refers to what former members of the Church of Scientology have said about the religion.  More information on his comments can be found in his book 'The Church of Fear: Inside the Weird World of Scientology' (published by Silvertail Books), and also in a 1984 High Court judgement http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~dst/Cowen/audit/latey.html
